channel.title: Comments on: Sixty Seconds of Frodo Would Have Been Plenty

item.title: By: Side-Effect
item.dc:creator: Side-Effect
item.content:encoded:
Yea i fully agree, there was like a total of 1min 30sec of gameplay, what a waste of half an hour. I could care less about seeing reactions to complete tools who probably dont even play video games.

a couple a dorks anda buncha black guys and rappers on there bein like “y0 dis hizzie is tizzite y0!”

worst line from a guy on pimp my ride
“Normally i roll with mah man X, but today, im pimpin a whole different type of X”

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
A live blog is one that's not dead. (duh!)
Actually, it's a technique. It has the immediacy and the rawness of performance art. Free of the usual edit and polish, live blog posts are edgy and ripe with the emotion and passion of the moment in which they were created.
Or, it's bitching real time via the blog.
(Never let it be said that I'm not a master of bullshit.)
item.content:encoded:
A live blog is one that’s not dead. (duh!)

Actually, it’s a technique. It has the immediacy and the rawness of performance art. Free of the usual edit and polish, live blog posts are edgy and ripe with the emotion and passion of the moment in which they were created.

Or, it’s bitching real time via the blog.

(Never let it be said that I’m not a master of bullshit.)

item.title: By: GreenMarine
item.dc:creator: GreenMarine
item.description: WTF is a live blog? Is that for people who don't have TVs ?
item.content:encoded: WTF is a live blog? Is that for people who don’t have TVs ?

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description:
There was exactly 1m 24s of gameplay footage shown in the half hour show.
Yay MTV!
item.content:encoded:
There was exactly 1m 24s of gameplay footage shown in the half hour show.

Yay MTV!
